briefdescription.para: Safely duplicates a string, handling memory allocation errors.

simplesect.para: A newly allocated copy of the input string

briefdescription.para: Determines the appropriate emoji for files in the /dev directory.

detaileddescription.para: Determines the appropriate emoji for a device file in the /dev directory.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the file in the /dev directory

simplesect.para: A dynamically allocated string containing the emoji

briefdescription.para: Checks the file content for specific patterns to determine the file type.

simplesect.para: A dynamically allocated string containing the emoji, or NULL if no match

briefdescription.para: Determines the appropriate emoji for a given file based on its characteristics.

detaileddescription.para: Determines the appropriate emoji for a given file path.

simplesect.para: A dynamically allocated string containing the emoji

briefdescription.para: Checks if a file is executable.

simplesect.para: 1 if the file is executable, 0 otherwise

briefdescription.para: Checks if a file is a text file by examining its contents.

detaileddescription.para: Checks if a file is a text file.

simplesect.para: 1 if the file is likely a text file, 0 otherwise

briefdescription.para: Implementation of emoji utility functions for file representation.

detaileddescription.para: This file contains functions for determining appropriate emojis for files based on their types, attributes, and locations. It supports both regular files and special files in the /dev directory.
